# NSColor.ColorType.pattern

**Case**

Colors that include an image to be used as a pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
case pattern
```

## Discussion

Colors of this type store a value in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/patternImage] property.

## Color Types

- **NSColor.ColorType.componentBased**: Colors that include floating-point color components and a color space.
- **NSColor.ColorType.catalog**: Colors that are retrieved from an asset catalog.
